name: HeroQuiz
0:
”Alexa, open hero quiz”
”Alexa, start hero quiz”
”Alexa, launch hero quiz”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hero quiz
Developer Terms of Use
des:
"Hero Quiz" is an Alexa skill game designed to test your general knowledge about super heroes from around the world.
Users are asked general questions and must answer with a "yes" or "no." Each time the user guesses the answer, they earn one point. Every ten questions the user's point will be announced.
The multiplayer mode supports up to two players.
In the multiplayer mode each 20 questions will reveal the players' scores.
